alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:14PM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches except between 2 and 4 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 or 50 mph will create areas of reduced visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Estancia Valley, Far Northeast Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow packed and icy roadways are likely. These hazardous travel conditions will impact the holiday travel period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands
